testcase.name: Fallback Service should return a generic fallback response
Cache Service initSync() initializes the cache from disk
Cache Service initSync() creates a new cache if file does not exist
Cache Service initSync() handles read errors gracefully
Cache Service generateHash() creates consistent hashes for the same question
Cache Service generateHash() creates different hashes for different questions
Cache Service calculateSimilarity() returns 1 for identical strings
Cache Service calculateSimilarity() returns 0 for completely different strings
Cache Service calculateSimilarity() returns a value between 0 and 1 for partially similar strings
Cache Service findInCache() finds an exact match by hash
Cache Service findInCache() finds a similar match
Cache Service findInCache() returns null when no match is found
Cache Service findInCache() marks stale entries for refresh
Cache Service addToCache() adds a new entry to the cache
Cache Service addToCache() includes game context when provided
Cache Service getStats() returns accurate statistics
Cache Service pruneCache() removes old, rarely accessed entries
Cache Service Edge Cases handles very long questions
Cache Service Edge Cases handles Unicode characters in questions and answers
Cache Service Edge Cases handles special characters and punctuation appropriately
Cache Service Edge Cases rejects empty or invalid inputs
Cache Service Edge Cases handles file system errors gracefully
Cache Service Edge Cases should handle read errors gracefully when restoring from backup
Cache Service Edge Cases should implement LRU cache eviction correctly
